OOC: I'm still reading books about Ninja and Samurai plus talking to a 
japanese friend for info so the rules are still foregin to me. He was here 
when I checked my mail and explained the scent thing so I have some 
understanding of the Ninja way. He's trying to help me widen the Line 
between your basic fighting Theif a Ninja and Samurai. I just asking 
everyone to bear with me for a few more week until my lessons as he calls it 
are finished thanks. He also say "hi" to everyone and that I may end up just 
being a basic Kensai= Saint of the Sword.
